mapper.insert: insert into message (msg_id, receiver_id, re_group, sender, message, send_date_time, readd) values (#{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{readd,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update message
receiver_id = #{receiverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
re_group = #{reGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sender = #{sender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_date_time = #{sendDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
readd = #{readd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where msg_id = #{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
